verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3117"\w* troops, mobilize \w your|strong="H4480"\w* troops; \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* siege \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H3478"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*! \w With|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* strike \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cheek \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* judge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, Bethlehem Ephrathah, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* small \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clans \f + \fr 5:2 \ft Or thousands\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah, \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* ruler \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \f + \fr 5:2 \ft Cited in Matthew 2:6\f*— \w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* origins \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* eternity.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* Israel \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* abandoned \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* labor \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given birth; \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* brothers \w will|strong="H3068"\w* return \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* flock \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* majestic name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* dwell securely, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* greatness \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w extend|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* peace \f + \fr 5:5 \ft Or their peace\f* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Assyria invades \w our|strong="H5337"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w tramples|strong="H1869"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* citadels. \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* raise \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* seven \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* eight leaders \w of|strong="H1366"\w* men.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rule \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nimrod \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* blade drawn. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Assyria invades \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* marches \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* borders. The Remnant of Jacob (Micah 2:12–13)

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* showers \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* grass, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w do|strong="H3715"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* wait \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w or|strong="H1471"\w* linger \w for|strong="H5971"\w* mankind.

\w Then|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remnant \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* many peoples, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep, \w which|strong="H3605"\w* tramples \w and|strong="H3027"\w* tears \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* passes \w through|strong="H3027"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* rescue \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* lifted \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* foes, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

“\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day,” declares \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* remove \w your|strong="H3605"\w* horses \w from|strong="H3772"\w* among \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* wreck \w your|strong="H3605"\w* chariots.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* remove \w the|strong="H3772"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* land \w and|strong="H3027"\w* tear \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* strongholds.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* sorceries \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fortune-tellers.

\w I|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* also cut off \w the|strong="H7130"\w* carved images \w and|strong="H5892"\w* sacred pillars \w from|strong="H5892"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w*, so \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* no longer bow \w down|strong="H8045"\w* \w to|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* work \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* own hands.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* root \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Asherah poles \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w and|strong="H8085"\w* demolish \w your|strong="H8085"\w* cities.
I will take vengeance in anger and wrath upon the nations that have not obeyed Me.”
